query: UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'lead' WHERE status IN ('pending', 'new_lead', 'contacted'); UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'appointment_set' WHERE status = 'appointment_set'; UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'prospect' WHERE status IN ('inspection_scheduled', 'inspection_complete'); UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'closed_deal' WHERE status = 'closed_won'; UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'closed_lost' WHERE status IN ('closed_lost', 'cancelled'); UPDATE report_requests SET status = 'invoiced' WHERE status IN ('report_sent', 'follow_up');
